@1,2@ Constructs an end-of-stream iterator.

@3@ Initializes the iterator and stores the value of {{c|is.rdbuf()}} in a data member. If {{c|is.rdbuf()}} is null, then end-of-stream iterator is constructed. 

@4@ Initializes the iterator and stores the value of {{c|s}} in a data member. If {{c|s}} is null, then end-of-stream iterator is constructed.

@5@ Effectively call {{v|3}} with the {{tt|streambuf_type*}} pointer {{c|p}} holds.

@6@ The copy constructor is trivial and explicitly defaulted.

{{rrev|until=c++11|
The copy constructor is effectively implicitly declared and not guaranteed to be trivial.
}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|is|stream to obtain the stream buffer from}}
{{par|s|stream buffer to initialize the iterator with}}
{{par|p|object of the implementation-defined proxy type}}
{{par end}}
